meta.title: Winona Area Public Schools - PreK-12 in Winona, MN

meta.name: description
meta.content: We empower students of all ages to be life-long learners who demonstrate creative thinking, critical analysis and problem solving skills in an ever changing and challenging world.
We empower students of all ages to be life-long learners who demonstrate creative thinking, critical analysis and problem solving skills in an ever changing and challenging world.

Winona, MN 55987
507.494.0861

a.title: Powered by Finalsite opens in a new window

article.h2: WAPS to remain in distance learning

div.p: Winona Area Public Schools will remain in distance learning for the rest of the school year as part of the state's response to the coronavirus pandemic. During this time, all activities, events, facility rentals and Community Education Adult Enrichment programs are canceled or postponed.
Click here to see our distance learning plan.
WAPS will continue to provide meals for all students in our community by delivering it to bus stops throughout the district and to walk-up sites.

ul.li: To order a meal for a walk-up site in the city, fill out this form.
To order a meal to be delivered to a bus stop, fill out this form.

div.p: Child care is available for the children of emergency workers as defined by the state. Please fill out this form to request child care. Please note that we need two business days to set up child care for your student.
Please keep in mind that this is a rapidly changing situation. Your patience and understanding is appreciated as we navigate this challenge.
